abstract: Anheuser-Busch, which has agreed to be acquired by a rival Belgian brewery, InBev, reported higher quarterly profit on Wednesday, helped by price increases and the introduction of Bud Light Lime.
lead_paragraph: Anheuser-Busch, which has agreed to be acquired by a rival Belgian brewery, InBev, reported higher quarterly profit on Wednesday, helped by price increases and the introduction of Bud Light Lime.

headline.main: Anheuser’s Profit Rises, Helped by Price Increases
